survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Indoor Vertical Farming Kits
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have purchased indoor vertical farming kits to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor vertical farming kit overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for accurate sentiment measurement. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor vertical farming kit overall?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most often in your indoor vertical farming kit? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand feature popularity.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most often in your indoor vertical farming kit? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How easy was it to set up your indoor vertical farming kit?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to assess setup experience.

script.question_text: How easy was it to set up your indoor vertical farming kit?

questions.question_text: What types of plants have you successfully grown with your indoor vertical farming kit?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture diverse responses. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed answers.

script.question_text: What types of plants have you successfully grown with your indoor vertical farming kit?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this indoor vertical farming kit to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this indoor vertical farming kit to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future versions of this indoor vertical farming kit?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future versions of this indoor vertical farming kit?
